item.title: 🐘 Hosteroid/domain-monitor (61 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: Hosteroid

📝 Repository: Hosteroid/domain-monitor

📄 Descrizione: A self-hosted PHP domain expiration monitoring tool that tracks domain expiry dates, RDAP/WHOIS data, and SSL certificate validity. Supports alerts, multi-user setup, and cron automation. Built for developers, hosting providers, and IT admins who want full control without third-party services.
